name: Underground Crash VR
description:
Join Discord : https://discord.gg/g8GkEd7whc

Immerse yourself in the racing scene, where you will burn your dreams with passion as a underground driver and challenge the limits with speed! Here is full of all kinds of racing challenges. Keep polishing your skills, earn prizes in events, and upgrade your car! Different play modes and vehicles are waiting for you to unlock.

FEATURE: Race: Tense and exciting race, experience the realism of racing simulation, drifting nitrogen acceleration allows you to overtake on curves.

DEMOLITION DERBY: Smash the enemy's vehicles to pieces until they can't move forward!

Coin Eater: Earn coins at the fastest speed, upgrade and modify your car!

Tracks: 4 well-designed tracks for beginners and veterans to challenge different difficulties.

Vehicles: 4 different styles of vehicles, realistic, sci-fi, cool and cute, satisfying your various fantasies about racing.

We hope to grow together with you! Come join our Discord server to see upcoming updates of Underground Crash VR. We need your suggestions! Yes, we need you!!!
